metric.originalName: Built-in SQL Functions need to be refactored
metric.english: This quality rule searches for following Built-in functions inside SQL files: ATANH, BIGINT, BITANDNOT, BITOR, BITNOT, BITXOR, BLOB, CHAR, CHARACTER_LENGTH, CHAR_LENGTH, CLOB, COT, CURRENT_DATE, CURRENT_SERVER, SQLID, TIME, CURRENT_USER, CURSOR_ROWCOUNT, DATE, ... The list of Built-in functions searched can be configured in parsedefine.xml at the root of the extension. The Rulename is "Built_in_SQL_Functions_variations".

metric.originalName: Built-in SQL Functions need to be refactored
metric.english: Built-in SQL Functions need to be refactored

metric.originalName: Built-in SQL Functions need to be refactored
metric.english: Associated to each sql with violation, the quality rule provides: - The number of violation patterns - Bookmarks for violation patterns found in source code

metric.originalName: Built-in SQL Functions need to be refactored
metric.english: Without adaptation, the SQL script won’t compile on Oracle, leading to error

metric.originalName: Built-in SQL Functions need to be refactored
metric.english: Review the implementation and convert to Oracle supported functions.

metric.originalName: Built-in SQL Functions need to be refactored
metric.english: Number of violation patterns found in DB2 SQL file, Built-in SQL Functions.

metric.originalName: Built-in SQL Functions need to be refactored
metric.english: Db2 migration best practices. http://www.sqlines.com/db2-to-oracle#built-in-sql-functions

metric.originalName: Built-in SQL Functions need to be refactored
metric.english: Number of DB2 SQL file.

metric.originalName: Converting SQL language elements variations from DB2 to oracle
metric.english: This quality rule searches for following language elements inside SQL files: CONCAT, NEXT_VALUE, RESULT_SET_LOCATOR. The list of language elements searched can be configured in parsedefine.xml at the root of the extension. The Rulename is "SQL_language_elements_variations".

metric.originalName: Converting SQL language elements variations from DB2 to oracle
metric.english: Review the implementation and convert to language elements variations to Oracle supported elements.

metric.originalName: Converting SQL language elements variations from DB2 to oracle
metric.english: Number of violation patterns found in DB2 SQL file, language elements.

metric.originalName: Converting SQL language elements variations from DB2 to oracle
metric.english: Db2 migration best practices. http://www.sqlines.com/db2-to-oracle#language-elements

metric.originalName: Data Types variations from DB2 to Oracle
metric.english: This quality rule searches for following Data Types inside SQL files: BIGINT, CHAR_FOR_BIT_DATA, CHARACTER_VARYING, DBCLOB, DECIMAL, DECFLOAT, FLOAT, GRAPHIC, INTEGER, NCHAR_VARYING, NUMERIC, REAL, SMALLINT, TIME, VARCHAR, VARCHAR FOR BIT DATA, VARGRAPHIC, XML. The list of Db2 Data Types searched can be configured in parsedefine.xml at the root of the extension. The Rulename is "Data_Types_variations".

metric.originalName: SELECT Statements from DB2 to Oracle need to be refactored
metric.english: This quality rule searches for following SELECT Statements variations inside SQL files: SYSDUMMY1, WITH_UR, FETCH, EXCEPT.
